name: XXS Amsterdam
description:
XXS Amsterdam is an independent creative agency that uses the power of creativity to boost businesses. Delivering Full Service 2.0 on an international level, XXS is armed with a solid base of 60+ creative and strategic thinkers, complemented by internal production, design, edit and audio studios. The agency takes pride in doing whatever it takes to help your business grow.
XXS Amsterdam has built its reputation through long-term partnerships with global brands such as Schweppes, Basic Fit and HEMA.
